title: Priority Design Workshop for Improving e-Learning Elements

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms and mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative project environments using digital devices, analyzing requirements for improving math education content

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively assess the difficulty and usefulness of e-learning elements (learning design, resource accessibility, interaction tools, etc.).
Learners can derive and visualize improvement priorities by applying the Quadrant of Difficulty-Usefulness (QoDU) model.
Learners can propose at least three improvement strategies for e-learning systems based on data collected in a PBL environment.

resources: QoDU (Quality of Design and Use) Analysis Worksheet

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
